item.title: You can only get on my server with my specific client how can i change?
item.dc:creator: @mellen mellen
item.description:
@mellen wrote:

is there a way to change this because i need to make a webclient but i cant because the client is screwed up and ive tried to log in but ive noiced that it said invalid client. so i had one more test i tried moparsscapes client but it didnt even log i. i checked my cmd and it said invalid client. can someone please tell me how to get rid of this? this is a 317

i found this is my cleint.java in my source

		if (server.playerHandler.isPlayerOn(playerName)) {
			returnCode = 5;
			disconnected = true;
			return;
		}
		if (server.enforceClient && !officialClient) {
			println("Invalid client!");
			returnCode = 12;
			disconnected = true;
			return;
